thread.title: FLAVIUS-ALEXANDRU FLOREA
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by FLAVIUS-ALEXANDRU FLOREA

author: FLAVIUS-ALEXANDRU FLOREA
title: FLAVIUS-ALEXANDRU FLOREA
text: I told them that I filled the coolant and after a few weeks a coolang warning came on my cluster. So I requested to check for a coolant leak. They haven't done that, just toped up again. After a few days warning light again and now the car is booked again to the service but nobody shown up to pick up the car and no one is answering on the phone.
